mdRecord.dcterms:title: Girls 1926 Floyd High School Basketball Team
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Girls 1926 Floyd High School basketball team. The people in the photograph are as follows: Row 1: Bill Cox, India DeHart, Mildred Robertson, Catherine Morgan Row 2: Elizabeth Williams, Mary Custis Burwell, Lillian DeHart Row 3: ?, Ruth See, Dotte Slusher, Mary Watkins Row 4: Joseph H. Poff coach, Edna Robertson
